$(document).ready(function() {
$("#login-school-list").change(function() { var action = $(this).val(); $("#district-login").attr("action", action); });
$('.br-login-submit').click(function () { $('.form-signin').submit(); $('.br-login-user').val(''); $('.br-login-pass').val(''); });
});

District COVID-19 / School Closure Information
For FamiliesÂ -Â AWRSD Learn from Home SiteÂ -Â Family Technology Help and Resources
For Staff - AWRSD Learning from Home Site - Staff Technology Help and Resources
Home
Backtrack
District
COVID-19 Educational Resources
COVID-19 Educational Resources
The following are resources recommended by AWRSD staff for use at home.
These are organized by school level.
All students
Mathematics
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/subjects/mathematics/?rank_by=popularity#.XnJMqKhKjZs
Science
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/subjects/science/
Social Studies
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/subjects/social-studies/?rank_by=relevance#.XnJMjahKjZs
Health and Physical Education
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/subjects/health-and-physical-education/?rank_by=popularity#.XnJMvqhKjZs
https://twitter.com/petroyberg
Languages
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/subjects/world-languages/#.XnJM5KhKjZs
Arts
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/subjects/the-arts/#.XnJNB6hKjZs
https://npg.si.edu/teachers/classroom-resources?mc_cid=a1b64e28dd&mc_eid=d5e08173bb
Technology Engineering
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/subjects/engineering--technology/?rank_by=popularity#.XnJNGahKjZs
High School Students
High School Students will be contacted on Monday's during the closure via PlusPortals or Google Classroom with recommended resources.
High School students can still access their online resources via Classlink: http://launchpad.classlink.com/awrsd.Â Use your network username and password to gain access to your Classlink window.
Other High School Resources
General
https://www.wgbh.org/distance-learning-center/broadcast
English Language Arts
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/collection/mpc/#.XnI7S6hKjZs
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/collection/shakespeare-uncovered/#.XnI7iahKjZs
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/collection/great-american-read/#.XnI_BqhKjZs
Guidance:
Naviance (research college and careers)
Scholarship Applications
Â
Middle School Students
Resources from Middle School TeachersÂ - This Google doc lists resources recommended from your child's teacher.Â This should be the primary resource you should refer to for resources directly connected to the curriculum.
Middle School students can still access their online resources via Classlink:Â http://launchpad.classlink.com/awrsd.Â Use your Google username without the '@student.awrsd.org' and password to gain access to your Classlink window.
Other Middle School Resources
General
https://www.wgbh.org/distance-learning-center/broadcast
English Language Arts
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/collection/midlit/
Â
Elementary School Students
Resources from Elementary School Teachers -Â This Google doc lists resources recommended from your child's teacher.Â This should be the primary resource you should refer to for resources directly connected to the curriculum.
Additional resources will be available weekly on your child's school webpage:
John R. Briggs Elementary Home Page
Meetinghouse School Home Page
Westminster Elementary School Home Page
Other Elementary School Resources:
English Language Arts
https://mass.pbslearningmedia.org/collection/k1.fluency/#.XnI43KhKjZs
Reading
https://time.com/tfk-free/
Specialists:
https://www.facebook.com/johnrbriggsspecialists/
https://www.kennedy-center.org/education/mo-willems/
https://sites.google.com/a/awrsd.org/jrb-tech/home
https://www.instagram.com/mrsdisalle/

if(Modernizr.mq('only all')) { $('html').addClass('mq'); }
$('.popup-trigger').magnificPopup({
type:'inline',
midClick: true
});
$('h1.responsive-headline-one').fitText(1.2, { minFontSize: '22px', maxFontSize: '34px' }); $('h1.responsive-headline-blog').fitText(1.2, { minFontSize: '18px', maxFontSize: '30px' });
$('.responsive-video').fitVids();
$('#main-menu').dropMenu({ speed: 250 });
